title: Gondor Will See It Done (2U34)
text:
Set:	Mines of Moria
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gondor
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Response: If a companion is about to take a wound, exert a [Gondor] companion to prevent that wound.
Lore:	”'Boromir!… Go after those two young hobbits, and guard them at the least, even if you cannot find Frodo.'”
Rarity:	U
